name: WP Tumblr Auto Publish
author: xyzscripts.com

sections.description:
Try it out on your free dummy site: Click here => https://tastewp.com/new/?pre-installed-plugin-slug=auto-publish-tumblr

A quick look into WP Tumblr Auto Publish :

★ Publish simple text message to Tumblr
★ Publish post to Tumblr with image or link
★ Filter items  to be published based on categories
★ Filter items to be published based on custom post types
★ Enable or disable wordpress page publishing
★ Customizable  message formats for Tumblr

WP Tumblr Auto Publish Features in Detail

The WP Tumblr Auto Publish lets you publish posts automatically from your blog to Tumblr. You can publish your posts to Tumblr as simple text message, text message with link or image. The plugin supports filtering posts by post-types and categories.

The prominent features of the WP Tumblr Auto Publish plugin are highlighted below.

Supported Mechanisms

The various mechanisms of posting to Tumblr are listed below.

Simple text message
Attach image to tumblr post
Attach link to tumblr post

Filter Settings

The plugin offers multiple kinds of filters for contents to be published automatically.

Enable or disable publishing of wordpress pages
Filter posts to be published based on categories
Filtering based on custom post types

Message Format Settings

The supported post elements which can be published are given below.

Post title
Post description
Post excerpt
Permalink
Blog title
User nicename
Post ID
Post publish date
User display name

About

WP Tumblr Auto Publish is developed and maintained by XYZScripts. For any support, you may contact us.

★ WP Tumblr Auto Publish User Guide
★ WP Tumblr Auto Publish FAQ

More Information

★ WP Tumblr Auto Publish User Guide
★ WP Tumblr Auto Publish FAQ

Troubleshooting

Please read the FAQ first if you are having problems.

Requirements

WordPress 3.0+
PHP 7.4+

Feedback

We would like to receive your feedback and suggestions about WP Tumblr Auto Publish plugin. You may submit them at our support desk.
sections.installation:
★ WP Tumblr Auto Publish User Guide
★ WP Tumblr Auto Publish FAQ

  1. Extract auto-publish-tumblr.zip to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. In the admin panel under plugins activate WP Tumblr Auto Publish.
  3. You can configure the settings from WP Tumblr Auto Publish menu. (Make sure to Authorize Tumblr application after saving the settings.)
  4. Once these are done, posts should get automatically published based on your filter settings.

If you need any further help, you may contact our support desk.
sections.faq:
★ WP Tumblr Auto Publish User Guide
★ WP Tumblr Auto Publish FAQ

1. The WP Tumblr Auto Publish is not working properly.

Please check the wordpress version you are using. Make sure it meets the minimum version recommended by us. Make sure all files of the wp tumblr auto publish plugin are uploaded to the folder wp-content/plugins/

2. How do I restrict auto publish to certain categories ?

Yes, you can specify the categories which need to be auto published from settings page.

3. Why do I have to create applications in Tumblr ?

When you create your own applications, it ensures that the posts to Tumblr are not shared with any message like “shared via xxx”

4. Which all data fields can I send to social networks ?

You may use post title, content, excerpt, permalink, site title, user nicename and user displayname for auto publishing.

5. Why do I see SSL related errors in logs ?

SSL peer verification may not be functioning in your server. Please turn off SSL peer verification in settings of plugin and try again.

6. Can I publish audio/video to tumblr ?

You need to purchase the premium version to use this feature.

More questions ?

Drop a mail and we shall get back to you with the answers.
sections.changelog:
WP Tumblr Auto Publish 1.2.2

Patch security vulnerability
Compatibility with latest version of wordpress

WP Tumblr Auto Publish 1.2.1

Added fix to prevent duplicate posting
Compatibility with latest version of wordpress

WP Tumblr Auto Publish 1.2

Compatibility with latest version of wordpress
Minor bugs fixed
Tumblr API updated
Multilingual support added
Option to configure auto publish settings while creating posts

WP Tumblr Auto Publish 1.1.1

Compatibility with latest version of wordpress
Minor bugs fixed

WP Tumblr Auto Publish 1.1

Compatibility with gutenberg editor
Tumblr post link added with status in post logs
Option to reuse last used auto publish settings on edit posts

WP Tumblr Auto Publish 1.0.1

Minor bug fixes
Applied WordPress time format in {POST_PUBLISH_DATE}
Increased logs count from 5 to 10
Option to view social media posts from auto publish logs
Settings menu reorganized
Compatibility with PHP version 7.2

WP Tumblr Auto Publish 1.0

First official launch.

sections.reviews:
It won't delete

By dd01a on December 24, 2022

Total rubbish. It's unusable unless it's PHP 8 or later, so I'm trying to delete the plugin, and it won't.

PHP 8.0 Required?

By D H (darrenholmes) on November 24, 2022

Unfortunately, the PHP 5 compatibility doesn't seem to apply, as I got this error message below: Composer detected issues in your platform: Your Composer dependencies require a PHP version ">= 8.0.2".

WP Tumblr Auto Publish

By cayuco on September 21, 2022

I installed this Plugin. Nowhere was to reed, that is only for PHP8.0. When i activate the plugin i get a white page and the failure message for "only PHP8.0". It is not down-compatible with PHP 7.4. So i wrote an email to the programmers and get a friendly "sorry". That was all. It is the first time, it's the first time I've installed such a dangerous plugin. I cannot deinstall it, i cannot activate it! and since then I can no longer import products from my POD operator into the shop. No works, no support - bad thing. Thanks for nothing, and hands off of this Plugin!!! cayuco

Tumblr doesn't work that way anymore

By DA Rasmussen (ameycoleman) on May 20, 2022

I'm guessing this app hasn't actually been updated in awhile. Because the steps to get an API key from Tumblr are different now and doesn't let you anymore. That's a shame, but whatever.

All ok, good

By fabiochito on June 30, 2021

It works very well, good

Very Helpful

By greerk87 on February 7, 2021

Great plugin, makes everything much easier!

Great plugin!

By artgb on August 27, 2020

It works great.

Good Plugin.

By zakariarashid on January 15, 2019

A very good and reliable plugin
